ActEmergency Management Act
SubjectNo. 122- (QC) Provincial Emergencies Financial Assistance Order
PrecisPROVINCIAL EMERGENCY FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER NÂ° 122 - which makes a declaration of federal concern and authorizes the federal government to provide financial assistance to the province of QUEBEC with respect to the arrival at the Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport in Montreal of repatriated victims living and deceased of the earthquake which affected Haiti on January 12, 2010 and who required support from the Province of Quebec between January 13, 2010 and March 31, 2010.
